title: Best Laptop for Everyday as well as High end Application.
review:
Now it is 1 and half year from Purchase.
Pros-
Display- Retina Display 2560x1600 is stunning. Even after full zooming, Image or text never becomes blur.

Battery- With WIFI is on, I actually took readings and I got 9 hours 45 min of battery. Which is outstanding.

Trackpad-Force Touch feels really great. Due to gestures, It becomes very easy to use trackpad.

Ports- It has 1 MagSafe 2 Charging port,2 USB ports, 2 Thunderbolt ports 1 SD card ,1 3.5mm headphone and 1 HDMI. USB 3 ports are very fast. Transfer speed is good. Thunderbolt to VGA adaptor is also great. Just Due to retina display, you have to adjust resolution of projector as projectors do not support 2560x1600 resolution. MagSafe 2 charging is incredible. As it is magnetic You don't have to worry about disconnecting wire. Even though if somebody pulls wire accidentally, just wire will get disconnected and it will prevent mac from falling. Also Charging indicator on charging wire shows you battery is fully charged or not. With HDMI you can easily use your TV as display for MacBook. 

Camera-720p facetime camera is not too bad. Photos comes really good. for FaceTime calling, video quality is also good

Keyboard- Even though it is not butterfly mechanism, typing is very good on this MacBook. For day to day typing, this keyboard is enough.

Connectivity- With bluetooth, you can send as well as receive any type of file from any device. For USB also any Pen drive can be attached to mac. So You can share files from MAC to windows as well as Linux based computers.

Music- You can actually download mp3 from internet and play it on Mac. There is no any restriction like iPhone or iPad. Sound Quality is awesome.

Cons-
Not useful for Gamers.
Due to SSD is 128 GB not useful for Boot  Camp.
Magsafe 2 port becomes dirty very soon. So charger pin does not fit well.You have to clean port regularly.
Sometimes apps stops working.
Sometimes it lags.
But overall good. If you really want to buy Mac then this 2015 model is really great option.

review:

About Macbook: The cost is really worth it. No match for the design, performance, speed and convenience.

title: High-end laptop,the best Macbook ever !!
review:
The MRP for 2016 Jan changed to 106900/-, although NO difference in Hardware SAME Product !! 

I absolutely love my MacBook Pro 13.3" laptop. Writing genuine review on my overall experience. 
************************************************************************ 

I've used my early 2015 13" Retina MBP pretty intensively every day. I also got 7.5% extra  - http://goo.gl/OyC5Ui via flipkart .I'm evaluating it relative to my 11" recent-year fully loaded MB Air and the most recent non-retina MB Pro, which I used for a year at work. 
Here are my impressions of the 2015 rMBP so far, relative to these other Macbooks: 

* Display 
This is the main reason I bought the rMBP and I'm absolutely thrilled with it. It blows away every other Macbook's display except of course the 15" retina MB Pro. 

* Weight 
The 13" rMBP weighs 3.5 pounds. Whether that feels like a burden or a breeze will depend on what you're comparing it to. 

* Force track pad 
The "force" part -- pressing the track pad harder to activate different features -- is not supported in most applications now, but more and more applications will support it in the coming year. Until that happens, it works great as a regular trackpad - better than the (already excellent) trackpad on previous MB Pros and Airs. I like using the new trackpad pretty well. But it's not a killer feature, and in the future when more apps take advantage of it it will probably be like having a third mouse button--handy, but hardly essential. 

* Speed & Performance 
The 2015 rMBP has a newer generation of processor and graphics. Everything feels very fast, including bootup times, app startup, running apps, etc. That said, the 2014 model feels very fast, too, and I don't think most people will notice any speed improvements with the 2015 model over the 2014 model in normal everyday usage. 
Apple claims the 2015 model's flash SSD is twice as fast as the SSD in the 2014 model. Independent testing from professional review sites have verified this. However, in normal usage, I don't notice much difference - the SSD in last year's model is pretty dang fast. 

* Battery life 
Apple claims 10 hours to a charge, compared with 9 hours on last year's model. Independent tests by professional reviewers largely support Apple's claim: Laptopmag.com reports 12 hours 4 minutes; PCMag.com gets 11 hours 10 minutes; CNET gets a whopping 15 hours 42 minutes. 

 
* Summary: should you buy one? 
Buy a retina MB Pro instead of an Air if you want a MUCH better display, more connectivity, a more powerful system, and don't mind an extra 1/2 pound relative to the 13" MB Air (or full pound relative to the 11" Air). 

If you choose the 13" retina MBP, I'd encourage you to shop around for good deals on last year's model. It has the same excellent screen, keyboard, design, and same exact weight and dimensions. The 2014 model doesn't have the new force trackpad, but I think most people can easily live without this. The new 2015 model is slightly faster, but I think most people won't notice the differences in every day usage--I wouldn't. If you can save $300 by getting last year's model, that seems like a no-brainer to me. I didn't do it because I'm a teacher, and with my education discount at the Apple online store I got a 2015 model for about the same price as the best deal I could find on last year's model.

title: Faster delivery with exciting exchange offer
review:
Really exciting with exchange offer and delivery service is truly surprising. They prepare us for a date, but deliver the product much earlier depending on the possibility. This truly unleashes the excitement to such levels that it is hard to contain. That too, when the product delivered is a macbook pro, to a first time mac-user, it is totally a speechless state with all smile on our face...!!

Truly love the service of Flipkart.....!!!!!

title: My First And The Most Amazing Macbook
review:
This is my First MacBook I am using so I won't be comparing it with other MacBooks .
With my first Experience I am telling you It is a great laptop to use. You Shouldn't Compare it with other "laptops" People usually think that MacBooks are overpriced but its not true .You get what you pay for.It works so Smoothly that you won't mind which processor is it Having.The Clock Speed is 2.7 GHZ and Upto 3.1GHZ which is Great Piece . And above all this do i need to say anything about the Retina Display, Everyone Knows about it, and if you don't then Google about it . 
If you have also been a loyal windows user ,like me then believe the price you pay is worth .
I purchased it from Chroma(Tata)  and Not from flipkart for  about 90K .If you are planning to Buy it for Gaming then go for Alienwares ,This is Not for you .Macs are made for performance accordingly with their pricing.Go for this one If you have budget 
Around 60k to 80K.

title: Comes With El Capitan Not Yosemite As Advertised
review: Was delivered in a day. Ordered it from WSretail - was packed neatly. The price on box was over 1 L, they are offering it under 95K which is a good bargain. This is perhaps the best budgeted macbook.

title: Just wow!
review: Coming from a Windows setup this laptop was a learning curve.... but it gives you another level of performance.... be it sound quality, display media experience trackpad experience build quality os experience..... i believe everyone should experience macbook atleast once... kudos to flipkart for ontime delivery and hassel less exchange of my old laptop

title: Perfect product!
review:
Well, I was a little skeptical before making the purchase through Flipkart. But I'm pretty pleased with how it turned out.
You can find a lot of reviews for the MacBook pro on the internet and chances are you are here to make the purchase only after going through them and realizing it is indeed an amazing laptop to have.
Coming back to Flipkart, my package was delivered within two days of ordering it with standard delivery. The package arrived in perfect condition and unboxing it was delight. I might consider shopping more from Flipkart after this purchase. Hoping for a similar experience ahead too.

title: Absolute rubbish!
review:
Extremely disappointed in the way apple India has treated this purchase of ours. Flipkart delivered well or not, m not so sure. Everything was fine but within a DAY! the screen had block spots. Black lines. Not a scratch and not a crack. Went to apple and they asked for 50000 to replace. This has been by far my worst experience both with flipkart and apple India. 

Purchased this expensive product only to find that no one cares how it gets to you. Flipkart definitely doesn't and apple service care is pathetic in India anyway. 

Check your purchase extrenely well when you receive it. 

Thanks
